website_summaries.verdict: You get exceptional value for money from this cost effective wig cap set. Made from stretchy elastic nylon with comfortable headband for extended usage.
pros: This pack includes 12 nylon wig caps
We love the thick elastic band that holds wigs well and prevents slipping
The lightweight material is breathable, but offers enough strength to stay put
cons: Some users think the product color to be more reddish than advertised brown color

customer_reviews.title: Great wig caps!
customer_reviews.text: These popped up on Amazon when I made a wig purchase. Didn't read any reviews and just ordered them (I normally read every review before making purchases). They're just stocking caps, right? I was so wrong. Besides the color matching, these things are not snagging, ripping, running, or doing anything that a normal stocking cap would do when poked with wig combs daily. I can barely see the hole that I forced with the wig comb. I'm impressed. Oh and they're big head friendly.
customer_reviews.author: HarlemGirl78

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color
customer_reviews.text: So I have a hard time finding these in the beauty store. I love the fact that I was able to get it on here for a reasonable price. I use them for my lace fronts and this particular color is a perfect match for my skin color. This is a perfect stocking if you’re my complexion. Hope this is helpful
customer_reviews.author: Genelle Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color, but strong chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: They are the perfect color, but they had a very strong chemical smell when I received them. I ended up letting them soak in some fabric softener overnight, and then washed them a few times with shampoo. That got most of the smell out, but they still have a little chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Unless you are a newborn these will be too small.
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are cut entirely to small. I am an adult female head circumference 20 1/2 and these stockings gave me a headache. I even tried to stretch them but it didnot work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon, Customer LAA

customer_reviews.title: Not Dark Brown, But Great Quality and Dyes Easily
customer_reviews.text: The 12 Pack Dreamlover Brown Stocking Wig Caps, Skin Tone Color Stretchy Nylon Close End Wig Caps were not as dark as I had hoped. However, they are of high quality. I was dying my hair dark brown to hide my grays so I applied my dye as usual and then had an idea to put one of the caps on while massaging in the dye. The cap color was perfectly dyed so I did it with 3 more for future use. When I rinsed the cap, the color stayed. So in conclusion, dye the cap when you color your hair or just dye the cap if you don't color your hair. either way, the cap dyes well.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected, will order again
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected. Great packaging, love the 12 pack - actors are always looking for an extra backstage. :-) I ordered nude and the color was as expected. The one I am wearing in this photo is well-used and has lasted for 2 weeks of 8-show weeks and multiple wig changes per show! The wig caps are contained in a heavy plastic satchel which functions as a smart dry storage bag. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: SMJ

customer_reviews.title: Holds on well but kinda rolls up
customer_reviews.text: The only part I dislike is that it tends to roll up around the back. I like the fact that it's not too tight to give me a headache. I wear it as I'm now working on restoring my hair that was previously damaged by relaxers, didn't moisturize well enough so with wig caps I just do basic cornrows, moisturize and wear them then a cute head wrap no stress on my hair from external factors. It also helps keep most of the oil on my hair and not all over my pillow as I layer up.
customer_reviews.author: Be

customer_reviews.title: Nice On chocolate skin 😍
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time ordering I use these under my units (stocking cap method) they match me just right Thankyou !
customer_reviews.author: Tye

customer_reviews.title: Brown color is NOT brown
customer_reviews.text: So the “brown” as you can see is not really brown. It looks more like beige than brown (I’m comparing it next to a beauty store bought brown). The one on the left is the one I had. The cap itself is super soft and very thin to the point where it’ll probably snag and rip within a couple wears. And if you’re a person like me who likes to rip their wig off as soon as they get home all 12 will be ripped within a week or 2. Definitely won’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Chanel B

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR DARKER SKINNED LADIES AND GENTS :)
customer_reviews.text: I really like these I will be reordering these, and this will be my main place to get my caps from. They match my skin without makeup and I am so glad they are awesome. I am always hesitant to ordering caps online, however, I am happy with my purchase. The color is amazing for a nude scalp look without the chalky look and they fit all head sizes. This cap melts awesomely when doing my lace fronts.
customer_reviews.author: Nakita

customer_reviews.title: Caps
customer_reviews.text: Love how many comes in a pack and also the packaging and quality of the caps .
customer_reviews.author: Tanya W

customer_reviews.title: feels durable(using for bald cap method)
customer_reviews.text: comes with 12. after the video i noticed there were two around each cardboard thing.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: I have a not overly large head, I have measured it. These SHOULD fit. However, the band at the bottom of the cap is much smaller, with much less give, than the rest of the cap. It was so small it hurt to wear, and I'm only wearing it for maybe 10 minutes while my hair air dries (so I don't get golf ball head with my growing out buzz cut, ty COVID). I can't imagine wearing this for hours. I ended up just cutting the band to give my apparently massive head more room. IT FELT LIKE I WAS CUTTING OFF THE CIRCULATION TO MY BRAIN.
customer_reviews.author: DrowsyKitten

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with purchasing these caps because they are good quality and affordable. I have visited the local stores in my area and saw lesser quality for more money. Also, I was unable to find a 12-pack. I will be making another purchase in the future. Love the product.
customer_reviews.author: j. king

customer_reviews.title: A must-have product.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product it arrived on time. It fit my head perfect I do wish your product came a little darker brown and a little more shear but I'm satisfied yes I will be purchasing more from you in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to be used in multiple ways: wigs, hairweaving, wave cap, hair net. My daughter, son, boyfriend and I, all used them in a different way and were completely satisfied. The sizing was perfect. They fit snug, but not too tight; and are sturdy and durable. Great pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing wig caps for yearsssssssss. I've purchased all of the ones located in the beauty supply store. This wig cap is hands down the best one that I ever encountered in my life❤ It fit very securely, doesn't feel tight at all, doesn't itch, no runs in the material and it feels very durable w/ high quality. I am happy I got a pack of them. I'm keeping them forever and will buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kimona

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely will purchase again, and also recommend this seller to my family and friends. The stocking itself, while soft, has a firmness credited by the wider band. I didn't worry if the cap would slide off, as many times with other caps. The construction, wide band and prompt service makes this a win win for me.
customer_reviews.author: Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I’m very picky when it comes to my wave caps... most I can’t sleep in at night due to the lack of comfort but these are by far the best stocking caps I’ve had I recommend anybody to get them especially if you have waves or wanna start waves
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The are so soft!!
customer_reviews.text: I randomly got these wig caps because I bought a new wig and threw these into my basket without reading the reviews. When I put on a cap, I was so pleased. These are the softest wig caps I've ever worn in my life. The brown matches my skin tone perfectly and the edge of the cap isn't too tight. I plan on ordering more of these when I've worn the ones I got into the ground, lol!
customer_reviews.author: Afrocurlitan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and a great value!
customer_reviews.text: The price was great! 12 caps for $6.19 is a much better value than what I have received at the beauty supply store, prior to Covid19. Previously, I paid $3.99 - $4.99 for two or three caps! I like the wide band and the fit, yet it's not too thin, nor too thick. It may be bit small for someone with long and/or thick hair. However, it is quite comfortable for someone with thin or zero hair. I like the brown color as well. It is close to my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Gail S.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The wig caps are sized well enough to fit any head circumference. Very easy to cut if needed or wear normally under the wig units. I have washed and worn again like you would for stockings or knee highs. I am dark skin so it worked well to image my scalp color. I will definitely purchase again. There are a total of 12 in this pack. This product is definitely worth the price and I thought was inexpensive. Delivery time was just as advertised. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved the feel and color
customer_reviews.text: Loved this natural color as a white women I am really pale tho so I like to dip mine in bleach and they come out to be a cool tone peachy color that matches my skin tone amazing. I ware a wig cap every day and lay down with spray an gel and I have never had one come apart or ripped. It's the softest cap I have ever wore. A must buy
customer_reviews.author: Discover

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: They last a long time. Very happy I got these! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lexie

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: A great quantity for such a little price! These work just as good as the more expensive wig caps, and I actually prefer the color of these more - looks more natural like a scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Skin Tone
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I decided to purchase these instead of buying from my local beauty supply store. It has been very hard to find the perfect skin tone for my wig stocking caps. They are either too brown or too beige. This was a perfect for my peanut butter brown complexion! Also, I like how the cap is really thin and light. Makes for great all day wear without feeling like I have too much stuff on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO SMALL!
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely not one size fits all. The smallest, tightest, most uncomfortable wig caps I have ever purchased. They are so tight they leave huge deep lines on my head. Once the one I was trying to wear just completely popped up, throwing my wig up off my head. Absolutely unwearable unless you have a 1950's size head.
customer_reviews.author: Brent A. Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: If you are very pale this will work well.
customer_reviews.text: I do struggle sometimes to find wig caps because most of the time they're very tan and I've got porcelain skin. These are perfect for my skin tone though!
customer_reviews.author: Tabby Nevi

customer_reviews.title: Good Product - Lousy USPS Shipping Method
customer_reviews.text: The product works like I needed it to. It keeps the straps on my C-PAP machine from pulling my hair out. My problem was the route the package took to get to me. It was ordered on 12/28/18 and arrived at a local USPS facility on 12/29/18. It then arrived in Honolulu, HI on 12/31/18. Then it arrived somewhere on 1/3/19 and was finally delivered on 12/4/19. USPS delivery sucks.
customer_reviews.author: boyduffer

customer_reviews.title: Will order again
customer_reviews.text: First ordered the smaller pack to make sure the color was a good match. Ordered this pack because they worked so well under my wigs.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time making a purchase of this product from this vendor. These stocking caps are flexible, lightweight, and the fact that you can purchase them in a 12 pack, makes it the best bargain ever. I wear wigs regularly, so I especially love the fact that they are light-weight, allowing my head to breathe.
customer_reviews.author: loispercente

customer_reviews.title: Perfect caps for women of color
customer_reviews.text: These caps are so soft and the perfect color for brown women. They are packaged very nicely. Will definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: LaLaa Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I like this wig cap, it was close to my skin tone and I do not have to tint it at all. I thoroughly enjoy wearing these. Not to mention a lot come in a pack! It doesn't make my head hurt as my night scarf can if I tie too tight, and black woman knows the type of headache you get when your scarf is too tight. I like this cap a lot and I will be using them for many years to come. It is super soft and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel Kent

customer_reviews.title: A little too tight
customer_reviews.text: These wig caps were exactly the color I wanted which I’m happy with, but the only thing is is that it feels tight on my head. And I have a smaller than average head. I start developing a headache during the end of the day, and then when I take it off 5 minutes later my headache is gone. My mom tried one on and her head is bigger than mine and she started having a headache as well. And yes I tried stretching them out, it didn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Doublea6402

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad that I found this product on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I found this product on Amazon! I love wearing wigs and go through quite a few wig caps. I will be ordering these again because I like getting the volume, the color, and the price is excellent. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchie

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase 👍
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, doesn't hurt my head while wearing. I like the little bag it comes in for storage, the are easy to put on too.
customer_reviews.author: Nequia Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Soft, thin nylon and the elastic band promotes a good fit.
customer_reviews.text: I wore the Dreamlover hair cap under my wig yesterday. It was exactly what was advertised on Amazon. The softness, thin nylon for air circulation and a perfect fit. I really like the caps and recommend this item to buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Edna G

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love buying tons of caps at once! It’s so much better for price. Anyways, the caps came well packaged and are soft and don’t tear easily especially if you have nails! If you apply makeup for stocking cap method, this is the cap for you! It takes very well to liquid/powder foundation or spray and isn’t super thick!
customer_reviews.author: xX8081

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product, the caps doesn't slide off my head.
customer_reviews.author: LaWanda Taylor

customer_reviews.title: These are like cheap pantyhose for your head
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping these would be the ticket for use on my chemo-caused balding head before putting on a wig. These are super thin pantyhose material, scratchy, and the band is so tight it gave me a headache within minutes. The last thing a cancer patient needs is something tight and scratchy! I do not recommend them unless you want to use them to tie up your tomato plants.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Tightly fit around edges
customer_reviews.text: I have a small head and these stockings fit a little tight but that's what you want my wigs don't move at all lol. And no rolling back. I have used the same one about 10 times and it's still hasn't lost it shape or grip.
customer_reviews.author: Quetta

customer_reviews.title: Buy before they run out
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tried them yet. I can say 12 caps for $8 are pretty affordable. I am buying a wig for the first time to give my natural hair a much needed break.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Great value wig liners
customer_reviews.text: These wig liners are soft and stay in place. The inside of the band appears to have a small strip of silicone that helps hold the band firmly in place. I would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This honestly is a verry comfortable wig cap. My head is 23” circumfrence and sometimes regular beauty suply wig caps fit a little too tight. But this one... its very breathable. The cap also matches my skin color wich is a plus. I will recommend and purchase again when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: michelle carter

customer_reviews.title: Best cap I have used
customer_reviews.text: The best caps I have ever used. The color looks perfect under lace wigs.
customer_reviews.author: Casaundra

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting stocking wig caps
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that they fit my head securely; last longer than most caps.
customer_reviews.author: 2yung

customer_reviews.title: awkward line shows through
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about quality wise- the caps work great. However, I thought that it would be the same opaqueness throughout the whole cap. You can still see a clear line maybe an inch or 3/4 inch into the cap under the wig. I also do not go over it in foundation or concealer because i just feel like it draws attention to the clear difference in color/opaqueness.
customer_reviews.author: Kim N.

customer_reviews.title: A staple item needed when wearing wigs☺
customer_reviews.text: I find that these color caps work better for me than the ones that I was using previously. I am a light to medium skin toned women with tan and Olive undertones so this is perfect when trying to conceal the lace on my unit. They are stretching and easy to work with. I can't wait to have some more of these so I don't run out. highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: GOLDEN GLAMOURZON

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: These are the darkest stocking caps I've ever come across, so if you're a brown skinned girl like me you definitely want to get this. The only con was the tightness, i made a small slit in the band to ease the pressure on my head and now I'm good to go
customer_reviews.author: Kaila Powell

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!!
customer_reviews.text: MY FAVORITE!! Great product and Excellent customer service. I love these stocking caps for wearing underneath my wigs. They are durable, breathable and protects my natural hair from friction of my wig.......... Oh let me mention THE COLOR IS PERFECT for women of color! What are you waiting on?? I know you were looking for the perfect cap stocking cap....... AND YOU FOUND IT ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Prentiss batts

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent product
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s pretty clear they are a distributor and buying different product from different manufacturers. If not they have a big issue with quality control. My first order the CEO’s were small but the band was too thick and heavy and could bee seem through the lace. The second batch I ordered were super thin and GIANT. I probably had five extra inches of material at the bottom. Unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: What the fudge you want from a ninja
customer_reviews.text: I mean they’re wig caps so I’m feeling like DMX...
customer_reviews.author: Uniquely Unicorn

customer_reviews.title: Great price for 12 in the pack
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's so many in the pack it's gonna last me a while thanks I will be ordering more 😊
customer_reviews.author: Da'Nesha Lindsey-Jones

customer_reviews.title: A must
customer_reviews.text: I mean it's your basic standard wig cap but I just noticed that it's a little bit more durable than some other ones. I mean after applying it for a lace wig and glue Etc it didn't air as much and I'm able to reuse and that's a plus cuz that saves money
customer_reviews.author: VENOMnVIPER

customer_reviews.title: Great deal  and color for my money
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful packaging,great deal for the price.Order ahead,my delivery date was delayed.I reordered because the color was what I wanted and needed.I'm satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Person

customer_reviews.title: Color misrepresentation.
customer_reviews.text: These caps are very light in color. The shade shown here is a misrepresentation of what you actually get. Good price for the quantity. The quality is actually not bad, just know that if you're a medium brown toned woman of color, you will need to use fabric color or black tea to tone up the color.
customer_reviews.author: Miyoshi1018

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible waste of money. Caps are too tight/small and roll up under wig. Useless, waste of money. Cannot use them at all. However, color was good. I will return them. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: P.g.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. Doesn’t work if you are trying to do the bold cap with the got 2 b glue. The spray does not adhere to this material
customer_reviews.author: BrooklynmeetsHOME

customer_reviews.title: Might work for small heads!
customer_reviews.text: Very small! After wearing for a short time my teeth began to ache- then my head. I finally figured out the cause and the symptoms disappeared after removing the net!! Maybe I have a big head!?
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Segal

customer_reviews.title: Wig-Wearer Approved
customer_reviews.text: Best wig caps I've ever bought. Last all day without coming loose, hardly notice they are there. Add a good buffer between forehead and scalp to wig, minimizing itchiness. Bonny pins go in without any trouble, don't tear the cap.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Losik

customer_reviews.title: great buy!
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a nice resealable package that can be used later for whatever. I got the mocha brown color by mistake but they are such great quality I’m going to keep them and order the lighter color also. They are thick, yet breathable. Inside the package are 6 packs of two caps.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have an average size head. These are too tight and uncomfortable around my head.
customer_reviews.author: Char0816

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY HAPPPYYY CUSTOMER !!️!!️!!️!!️😍
customer_reviews.text: Love loveee lovveeee it it matches my skin well where I don’t haft to do to much work but apply it fits firm very soft true to color and quantity thank u so much would definitely buy Agian I completely recommend because it’s very legit it came so fast and it’s a great deal
customer_reviews.author: MariahDavis

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: These wig caps seem like they are made well but they are way too tight. I have a small head and I get a headache if I wear these for too long. I would not recommend these at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft, No Fuzz, Tears, or Tangles from Friction
customer_reviews.text: These were very soft, and fit perfectly. No tears, no slips, and no fuzz from the friction between my hair and the wife. It allowed my hair/head to breathe. The softness, to me, also seems to prevent my hair from tangling or feeling dry and brittle.
customer_reviews.author: Neelix

customer_reviews.title: Fits good
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice product, there are two wig caps per piece of cardboard and they fit nicely/stretch and are very durable. I may have accidentally ripped one of mine up with some Bobby pins thought heh.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wig Caps
customer_reviews.text: The wig caps are very good and do seem to stay in place. I have not had them but for 2 weeks and have used them 4 times they are working fine and I have only used 1 so far. They are not streaching out of shape.
customer_reviews.author: Suni

customer_reviews.title: Great wig caps
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and fit my head perfectly. Thick enough so they don’t tear easily but thin enough to blend and do the bald cap method👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: You decide
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t work for me at all. I bought it to wear under a wig to keep it secure
customer_reviews.author: Denise T.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent merchandise purchase, item is detailed to description. Item delivered promptly and very satisfied with product. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Clairehair

customer_reviews.title: A step up
customer_reviews.text: Natural color to match skin tone better than black stocking cap. Reinforce around sides doesn't pull hair out.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Debonair

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the picture. They're fine but not the best. Tried cutting around it for my lace front and it no longer wanted to stay on like it became loose? But it's good overall.
customer_reviews.author: Chey

customer_reviews.title: A good buy....
customer_reviews.text: These are great...they're soft and the perfect size for any head. Unfortunately, I was looking for a darker brown but I kept them anyway because of the quality and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda wheeler

customer_reviews.title: good product. 4.5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: i’d give it 4.5 stars if i could. they aren’t bad. i wish they were darker, that’s all. i used them to make a bald cap for myself but the color didn’t match. otherwise, it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: As picture & it saved me a lot of money rather than going to the beauty supply store every time i need a cap and this was the perfect color for my skin tone
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Williams

customer_reviews.title: Come stretched out 👎🏾
customer_reviews.text: They are the right color and arrived on time. They are usable, however they come with a cardboard stuffed inside of them (as pictured above) so the caps are stretched out. I prefer my wig caps to stretch over time with my head, not arrive loose. Only two stars because they are usable but not so much for the smaller heads
customer_reviews.author: Kendra  Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: It’s just a little small for large heads. But other than that, serves its purpose. Purchasing this 12 pack is way cheaper than buying individual caps at the beauty store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for me
customer_reviews.text: I like them very soft and comfortable and it is not right that is my main love its not right I can't stand a wig cap tighter that the wig lol so these are perfect will rebuy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used the caps yet but I plan to soon when I wear another wig! I’m happy I have enough on hand now!
customer_reviews.author: Jokima Brown

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: They worked nice unfortunately had a very strong green like tint to them that showed underneath most wigs.
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: Great purchasing again
customer_reviews.text: Love this I have never worn a cap under my sew in so this was the first and it matches my scalp perfect this is where I am getting mines from now on and I get a great amount for the price
customer_reviews.author: Yadee

customer_reviews.title: Great Experience
customer_reviews.text: Received my product quicker then I thought I would. (Thanks for that). Does what it says it would do. I have no complaints. I would order again from seller.
customer_reviews.author: PStevenson

customer_reviews.title: Recommend Nice Wig Caps
customer_reviews.text: These are great to use. Excellent value for this selection. Does not run easy. This are very tight fitting. I recommend these to anyone for use.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: As pictured, so far..
customer_reviews.text: I love these stocking caps! They're soft and seem to be very high quality for the price. I haven't used them just yet, but I purchased them to go beneath my full laced wig! I will update once I have used them!
customer_reviews.author: Jae L.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These things are great, they are right but not head throbbing and they hold all my hair down
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: There’s so many! This will be my go to for stocking caps. You get so many for such a decent price and arrival was quick
customer_reviews.author: Angel N.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, big enough for thorough coverage. I have a big head and thick hair and these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good wig cap
customer_reviews.text: These were described as dark brown. They're not. They are a light brown color. So if you're looking for dark brown, this isn't it. They do work like any other wig cap but I was hoping the color would be as described.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzyblue

customer_reviews.title: Great Value averages out to .50 a cap
customer_reviews.text: Very great value. Same product as in hair supply store. I have enough to last me quite awhile now. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Nette

customer_reviews.title: NICE WIG CAPS!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT BUY! These nylon wig caps, "Are the same ones you purchase from the beauty supply store."
customer_reviews.author: Shaun J.

customer_reviews.title: best wig cap on the market
customer_reviews.text: This cap is amazing . Complete coverage and very soft. Love the color it blends perfect with the hair line.
customer_reviews.author: nikita c kyles barber

customer_reviews.title: color not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Color is not a true brown as expected. Wish it was darker. But good quality overall.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Elastic Band not very wide.
customer_reviews.text: The elastic band is NOT. As wide as pictured. Thats why i bought this product. To avoid that the band would roll under the wig. I haven’t tried it yet. I may change my review.
customer_reviews.author: Berangere L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color for a Black woman
customer_reviews.text: Good color for my scalp fits good I like that I have many because they get lost
customer_reviews.author: Debra Copes

customer_reviews.title: Do what your sign say or take it down!
customer_reviews.text: I order brown not beige ....horrible, just send what I order not a whole pack of unusable caps.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. M

customer_reviews.title: More Transparent than Beige
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for wig caps to match my skin tone and got these but they’re so thin once you get them on your head and stretch the color is almost not existent and it’s like having a transparent cap. Not really what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Only dislike is they don’t look exactly like the picture. I have a more red undertone so I thought the pic would be perfect, looks more Olive. But still, easily fixable with makeup and look better after the makeup that the lighter versions.
customer_reviews.author: SaRaii Captca

customer_reviews.title: As described bt...
customer_reviews.text: As described. Haven’t used them yet but the only reason I took a star off is it was actually darker then I expected but no other issues.
customer_reviews.author: IzzyDaRealist

customer_reviews.title: Wig cap
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression that I was getting more than one wig cap. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ZB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my business !
customer_reviews.text: I love this cap! I use these for my business RagsToWealthExtensions.com or go to IG @ragstowealthextensions to see more! perfect packaging hair to give to my customers and for me to use when installing my wigs. This is a kinky curly bundles & Frontal made into a wig
customer_reviews.author: RagsToWealthExtensions

product_meta.title: Dreamlover Brown Stocking Wig Caps, 12 Pack
feature_bullets: Dreamlover brown wig stocking caps are elaborately designed for black women, men and kids. They are awesome invisible brown wig cap to nicely match customers who have brown skin color
Our brown wig caps can be used as bald head wig caps for lace front wigs. The thin and breathable nylon also makes it very breathable, which are perfect as wig hair caps for sensitive scalp
These brown nylon wig caps have great elasticity. They can be small wig caps for children, but can also be stretched as large wig caps for women and men
If you are looking for durable but cheap wig caps for cosplay, or comfortable wig caps for people lost hair from cancer, the Dreamlover brown stocking wig caps will be your great choice
Package includes 12 brown dome wig caps, and each 2 nylon wig caps are overlapped on a paper board. They are cost-effective stocking wig caps for long and short hair

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
